title: 服务器灵魂绑定插件设置权限后物品还是会掉落
author: TheSuncommand
txt_content:
本帖最后由 TheSuncommand 于 2019-2-4 03:59 编辑 
求助,我的服务器把灵魂绑定插件的死亡不掉落打开了,随后还是掉落
而且不是一般的掉落,死亡后直接没了
配置文件为:#
#  Soulbound configuration
#  Last updated on 1.1.9-b71
#
#####

#
#  Settings for Soulbound in general
###
General:
    # Allow Soulbound to report on basic anonymous usage
    Stats_Tracking: true

    # Allow Soulbound to check if a new version is available
    Update_Check: true
    Prefer_Beta: false

    # Should Soulbound print out debug messages?
    Verbose_Logging: false

    # Should Soulbound over-write configs to update, or make new ones ending in .new?
    Config_Update_Overwrite: true

Soulbound:
    Feedback_Messages_Enabled: true
    Prevent_Item_Drop: true
    Delete_On_Drop: false
    Allow_Item_Storing: false
    Infinite_Durability: false
    Blocked_Commands:
        /blockedcommand
    Commands_Bind_When_Used:
        /enchant

Dependency_Plugins:
    DiabloDrops:
        BindOnPickup: Legendary, Rare, Unidentified
        BindOnUse: Magical
        BindOnEquip: Set
    EpicBossRecoded:
        BindOnPickup: true
        BindOnUse: false
        BindOnEquip: false
    LoreLocks:
        Bind_Keys: true
    MythicDrops:
        BindOnPickup: common, uncommon, rare
        BindOnUse: terric, netheric
        BindOnEquip: endric

replies.author: 白灯
replies.txt_content:
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-355465-1-1.html复制代码应该是要给以下两个权限:
soulbound.items.keep_on_death
soulbound.items.delete_on_death复制代码
